price: Talagang kung namatay kayo o napatay kayo ay talagang tungo kay Allāh kakalapin kayo [para gantihan].
arabic: وَلَئِن مُّتُّمۡ أَوۡ قُتِلۡتُمۡ لَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُحۡشَرُونَ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wala-in muttum aw qutil'tum la-ilā al-lahi tuḥ'sharūna
